com.tokelon.toktales.core.content.sprite

Interface ISprite

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpriteImpl, SpritesetSprite, TiledTileSprite

    public interface ISprite
    Note that two ISprite are equal if their names and existing ISpritesets are equal. A resource will be ignored.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NAME_MODE_ABSOLUTE 
      static int NAME_MODE_CONTAINED 
      static int NAME_MODE_START

      boolean isEnclosed()
      A Sprite is enclosed if it is part of a Spriteset.

    • Method Detail

      • hasResourceAttached

        boolean hasResourceAttached()

      • getResource

        IResource getResource()

      • getAssetKey

        ISpriteAssetKey getAssetKey()

      • getSpriteName

        String getSpriteName()

      • isEnclosed

        boolean isEnclosed()
        A Sprite is enclosed if it is part of a Spriteset.
        Returns:
        True if this sprite is enclosed, false it not.

      • getSpriteset

        ISpriteset getSpriteset()
        Returns:
        The enclosing Spriteset or null if this sprite is not enclosed.

      • getSpritesetIndex

        int getSpritesetIndex()
        Returns:
        The index of this sprite in the Spriteset. Returns -1 if this sprite is not enclosed.
